https://tmrev.io/movie/616640-Cooked: Survival by Zip Code 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qyZMdcwukyGfKMMwJwwS73DqRB4.jpg Filmmaker Judith Helfand's searing investigation into the politics of “disaster” – by way of the deadly 1995 Chicago heat wave, in which 739 residents perished (mostly Black and living in the city’s poorest neighborhoods). Cooked: Survival by Zip Code
